snippet: Ivan Jones, a suspect in a rape accusation this week, managed to slip out of a jail in the Bronx in 2004, when he was serving time for a burglary.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on rape suspect Ivan Jones, who managed to escape from a jail in the Bronx in 2004, where he was serving time for a burglary; Jones has now been arrested and charged with rape, robbery, strangulation and assault after following a 33-year-old tourist from North Carolina to her hotel in the Bronx.
lead_paragraph: Ivan Jones, a suspect in a rape accusation this week, managed to slip out of a jail in the Bronx in 2004, when he was serving time for a burglary.

headline.seo: A Suspect in a Rape Known to Have a Knack for Escaping Custody
headline.main: A Suspect With a Knack for Escape
headline.print_headline: A Suspect With a Knack For Escape
